statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_health_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature, oil_pressure FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE tire_pressure > 30;
SELECT vehicle_id, tire_pressure, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE engine_temperature < 80;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_health_data ORDER BY tire_pressure DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE oil_pressure < 20;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature, oil_pressure, tire_pressure, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE oil_pressure < 30;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature, CAST(oil_pressure AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS oil_pressure_formatted FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_health_data ORDER BY tire_pressure DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature, oil_pressure FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE oil_pressure > 50 AND tire_pressure < 35 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleHealthData;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_health FROM VehicleHealthData;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, tire_pressure FROM VehicleHealthData WHERE engine_health > 80;
SELECT * FROM VehicleHealthData WHERE engine_health > 80
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleHealthData WHERE tire_pressure < 30
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_health, tire_pressure FROM VehicleHealthData WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT vh.vehicle_id, vh.engine_health, ms.maintenance_type FROM VehicleHealthData vh JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ms ON vh.vehicle_id = ms.vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleHealthData ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM VehicleInfo;
SELECT vehicle_model, odometer_reading FROM VehicleInfo WHERE odometer_reading > 50000;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_model, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleInfo WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM VehicleInfo;
SELECT vehicle_model, odometer_reading FROM VehicleInfo WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_model, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleInfo ORDER BY odometer_reading DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, parts_replaced FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY vehicle_id, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, last_maintenance_date FROM Vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceChecks WHERE check_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT mechanic_id, mechanic_name, mechanic_specialty FROM Mechanics;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC, vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM Vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_make;
SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, mh.repair_date FROM Vehicles v JOIN VehicleHistory mh ON v.vehicle_id = mh.vehicle_id WHERE mh.repair_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT mh.repair_date, m.mechanic_name FROM VehicleHistory mh JOIN Mechanics m ON mh.mechanic_id = m.mechanic_id WHERE m.mechanic_specialty = 'Engine';
SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, mc.check_type, mc.check_result FROM Vehicles v JOIN MaintenanceChecks mc ON v.vehicle_id = mc.vehicle_id WHERE mc.check_result = 'Passed';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_checks WHERE check_type = 'Safety Check';
SELECT task_description, task_status FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC, vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_model, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;

SELECT v.vehicle_name, v.vehicle_model, mh.maintenance_date, mt.maintenance_type FROM vehicles v JOIN maintenance_history mh ON v.vehicle_id = mh.vehicle_id JOIN maintenance_tasks mt ON v.vehicle_id = mt.vehicle_id WHERE mt.task_status = 'Pending';

SELECT v.vehicle_name, v.vehicle_model, mc.check_date, mc.check_type FROM vehicles v JOIN maintenance_checks mc ON v.vehicle_id = mc.vehicle_id WHERE mc.check_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mc.check_date DESC;

SELECT mp.personnel_name, mp.personnel_role, mh.maintenance_date, mh.maintenance_type FROM maintenance_personnel mp JOIN maintenance_history mh ON mp.personnel_id = mh.vehicle_id WHERE mh.maintenance_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY mh.maintenance_date ASC;
